title: Implement classify_spend() logic
description:
Implement pure function with thresholds from brainstorm.

## Implementation
```python
def classify_spend(ad_data: dict, account_avg_roas: float) -> str:
    roas = ad_data.get('roas', 0)
    spend = ad_data.get('spend', 0)
    days = ad_data.get('days_running', 0)
    
    # Learning phase - need more data
    if days < 7 or spend < 1000:
        return "WAIT"
    
    # Zero ROAS after significant spend
    if roas == 0 and spend >= 5000:
        return "BAD"
    
    # Calculate ratio vs account average
    if account_avg_roas == 0:
        return "WAIT"  # Can't calculate ratio
    
    roas_ratio = roas / account_avg_roas
    
    if roas_ratio >= 2.0:
        return "GOOD"   # Scale 30-100%
    elif roas_ratio >= 1.0:
        return "OK"     # Monitor
    elif roas_ratio >= 0.5:
        return "WARNING"  # Review
    else:
        return "BAD"    # Reduce 50%
```

## Decision Matrix
| ROAS vs Avg | Spend | Days | Status | Action |
|-------------|-------|------|--------|--------|
| >= 2x | >= $1k | >= 7 | GOOD | Scale 30-100% |
| 1x - 2x | >= $1k | >= 7 | OK | Monitor |
| 0.5x - 1x | >= $10k | >= 7 | WARNING | Review |
| < 0.5x | >= $10k | >= 7 | BAD | Reduce 50% |
| = 0 | >= $5k | >= 7 | BAD | Pause |
